Description.Text: Amber Hotel is a stylish 4-star property offering modern accommodation in the heart of Baku. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, a restaurant, cafe and an excellent location close to Baku State Circus. The Old City is the historic centre of Baku and has been recognised as a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Nearby places of interest include Maiden Tower, Shirvanshah's Palace, Juma Mosque and Baku State Circus. Nizami metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Baku destinations. The hotel is housed in a modern mid-rise building with an elegant facade featuring decorative stonework and wrought iron balconies. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 20sqm and decorated in a modern style with a white and brown colour scheme. They feature a sitting area with a table and two chairs. Amenities include air-conditioning, cable/satellite TV and a safe. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathrobe, walk-in shower or bathtub with integrated shower. The Amber Restaurant offers European cuisine and cocktails in a modern setting with a wood floor and floor-to-ceiling windows, while the Just cafe serves a range of dishes and desserts in a stylish space with green tones and artwork on the walls. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.
